title: Bug 121687: Exception thrown when exporting data from a table inside a grid cell
description: The bug involves an exception being thrown when attempting to export data from a table located within a grid cell.
OB: An exception is thrown during the attempt to export data.
EB: When exporting data from two tables, the expected result is successful data export. However, the actual result is an exception occurring in ReportEngineService.getMetaData().
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to the grid containing tables.
2. Attempt to export data from the tables.
3. Observe the exception being thrown in ReportEngineService.getMetaData().
